Data Center Features:

 - Biometric and 24x7x365 Onsite Security & Camera monitoring

 - Unmarked building

 - Dual power feeds

 - Diesel Generator on site and topped with fuel for emergencies

 - Tier 1 and 2 bandwidth providers including HE, Metro Ethernet, cogent, nlayer, level3 +more!

 - Over 22,000 Square Feet of data center space

 - Staff by team members 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. 

 

Want to get in the cloud, but need a custom configuration? Drop by our website and we'll be happy to assist.

Big Brain Global is a privately owned division of Big Brain LLC, the industry’s premier provider of commercial and consumer managed IT services. A carefully assembled team of business and IT experts deliver top-quality services on seller, Managed and Un-managed Virtual Environments, Dedicated Servers, and Colocation opportunities. With over a decade of industry experience, Big Brain’s certified staff is equipped with the analytical expertise and practical knowledge necessary to deliver network stability and business continuity. For more information, visit http://bigbrainglobal.com/.
